name: Database Connection Pool Exhaustion
description: Application fails due to all database connections being in use
root_cause: Database connection pool size too small or leaked connections
infra_fix: Increase DB pool size, enable connection leak detection

name: Downstream Service Timeout
description: Upstream service times out waiting for downstream dependency
root_cause: Downstream latency spike or network degradation
infra_fix: Add retries with backoff, tune timeout thresholds
